description: All agents have the same level of activity (26), which is unusual and may indicate a lack of differentiation in task allocation or a reporting error.
recommendation: Review the task allocation logic to ensure that each agent is receiving and reporting tasks appropriately. Investigate if there is a reporting issue causing identical activity levels.

description: API latency and throughput are significantly higher than CPU and memory usage, which could indicate a bottleneck or inefficiency in the system's API handling.
recommendation: Conduct a detailed analysis of the API handling processes to identify potential bottlenecks. Consider optimizing the API infrastructure or scaling resources to improve latency and throughput.

description: All compliance metrics are marked as true, which is expected, but continuous monitoring is recommended to ensure ongoing compliance.
recommendation: Implement regular audits and monitoring to ensure that compliance metrics remain true over time. This will help in early detection of any potential compliance issues.
